intro: A modern warfare FPS game where you become a member of an elite special forces unit and engage in extreme visuals created with a next-generation engine!
description:
Uncontrollable provocations, unforeseen all-out wars.
In <Modern Attack>, you face advanced threats crossing borders from the perspective of the world's best operators, and are deployed in an overwhelming operation that will change the paradigm of modern warfare.

The operation site is an isolated fortress on the front lines of the Middle East. It's a high-risk zone with no support or retreat.
In this constantly changing battlefield environment, your tactics are the only key to survival.
Participate in operations that cross the line of fire.

■ Stunning Visuals
Feel the air of the battlefield on your skin. Extreme graphics, perfectly calculated down to the smallest detail of light and shadow, forcefully summon you into the heart of modern warfare.

■ A vast battlefield that stretches beyond the horizon becomes your stage.
Cultivate your own path across the vast field and engage in free-flowing engagements that will change the course of battle.

■ Break through the limitations of the battlefield with powerful tactical mobility equipment.
Sprint across vast expanses to outmaneuver your enemies, and seize key objectives faster than anyone else to shake up the battlefield.

■ Perfect Team, Overwhelming Victory. Perfect your tactics with the unique equipment of Assault, Engineer, Support, and Recon.
Exciting cooperative action begins as you team up to achieve goals impossible alone.

■ Occupy, Collapse, or Exterminate.
Explore overwhelmingly large-scale engagements across three iconic modes. With the realistic physics of a next-generation engine, break through enemy defenses and rise to the top of the battlefield.

Synopsis
A massive, unmarked industrial complex, "Sector Delta," has been spotted on the front lines of the Middle East. This is a resource fortress established by "Onyx," a multinational corporation intent on dominating the global rare earths market.
To prevent the new materials they are refining from being leaked as key components for next-generation nuclear warheads, an elite special operations team is ordered to conduct an operation. You become an elite special forces agent and embark on the most dangerous operation ever undertaken.

Dive into the thrill of an overwhelming battlefield.
Your comrades, the most stalwart shields that will pierce through the fire and clear a path for you, await your deployment.
Become the final piece that will turn an impossible mission into victory.
